# Echo by mndly

> Echo by mndly — The Anti-Social Network. A Discord alternative built for people who want community without the noise.

## What is Echo?

Echo by mndly is a real-time communication and community platform — "The Anti-Social Network." It is a Discord alternative that allows users to create servers, channels, and communities to chat, connect, and collaborate, with a focus on intentional, distraction-free interaction.

## Key Features

- Real-time messaging
- Community servers and channels
- A modern, clean interface
- Built as an alternative to Discord

## URL

https://mndly.vercel.app

## Use Cases

- Online communities
- Friend groups
- Gaming communities
- Study groups
- Alternative to Discord, Slack, or other chat platforms
